  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202646</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Power sharing and The Lord Proprietors of North Carolina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewaltenteilung und der Lord Proprietors von 
Nord-Carolina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Partage de puissance et le seigneur Proprietors de
la Caroline du nord</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compartilhar de potência e o senhor Proprietors 
de North.carolina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Compartecipazione di potenza ed il signore 
proprietario di North.carolina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διανομή δύναμης και ο Λόρδος Proprietors της 
βόρειας Καρολίνας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El compartir de potencia y el señor Proprietors 
de Carolina del Norte</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson examines the essential question: How did government instability under the Lord Proprietors effect the development of North Carolina? The lesson has been modified for novice low English language learners.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion überprüft die wesentliche Frage: 
Wie bewirkte Regierung Instabilität unter dem Lord Proprietors 
die Entwicklung von Nord-Carolina? Die Lektion ist für niedrige
Anfänger englische Sprache des Anfängers geändert worden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon examine la question essentielle : 
Comment l'instabilité de gouvernement sous le seigneur 
Proprietors a-t-elle effectué le développement de la Caroline 
du nord ? La leçon a été modifiée pour de bas 
étudiants d'anglais de débutant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição examina a pergunta essencial: 
Como a instabilidade do governo sob o senhor Proprietors efetuou
o desenvolvimento de North.carolina? A lição foi modificada 
para learners de língua inglesa baixos do novice.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione esamina la domanda essenziale: 
Come l'instabilità di governo sotto il signore proprietario ha 
effettuato lo sviluppo di North.carolina? La lezione è stata 
modificata per gli studenti di lingue inglesi bassi del debuttante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα εξετάζει την ουσιαστική ερώτηση: 
Πώς η κυβερνητική αστάθεια κάτω από το Λόρδο 
Proprietors επηρέασε την ανάπτυξη της βόρειας Καρολίνας; 
Το μάθημα έχει τροποποιηθεί για τους χαμηλούς αρχαρίους 
αγγλικής γλώσσας αρχαρίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección examina la pregunta esencial: 
¿Cómo la inestabilidad del gobierno bajo el señor Proprietors 
efectuó el desarrollo de Carolina del Norte? La lección se ha 
modificado para los principiantes de lenguaje inglés bajos del 
principiante.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
  </description>
